description.value:
A cloud infused with the powers of death bursts out from you and causes those who breath it to begin to rot from the inside.
    A cloud of gas spreads out in a 30 foot radius around you. Each creature that you choose, that is hit by the cloud, must make a Constitution (Save) check. On a failed (Save) check, a creature takes 3d6 poison damage, as well as 3d6 necrotic damage, and is @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.9X088PM7H5U2S1HQ]{Sickened}. On a success the creature takes half damage and is not @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.9X088PM7H5U2S1HQ]{Sickened}.
    The gas cloud stays active up to 1 minute if the caster concentrates to keep it going, but stays stationary. Creatures that pass through the cloud, or end their turn within it, must make a Constitution (Save) check. On a success, nothing happens and they pass through it without harm. On a failure, creatures suffer 2d6 poison damage and 1d6 necrotic damage. Additionally, should a creature that was @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.9X088PM7H5U2S1HQ]{Sickened} fail a Constitution (Save) check against this effect, they become @Compendium[undertaking.conditions.SRRBLPRSJWGUR551]{Poisoned}.
